group_1.narration: Michelangelo's David. The Venus de Milo.@These works of art were sculpted to@capture the pinnacle of human beauty.
Even now after many centuries,@these works are still treasured@and adored as masterpieces.
Perhaps our pursuit of beauty@is part of what makes us human.

group_1.textRight: Aaaaaaah! Riaaaaaaaaa!@Look over here!
Oh my goshhh! She talked to us!!!

group_1.narration: Ria Ami...@At such a young age, she is@the super model everyone called @the "Cleopatra of the 21st century".

group_1.textRight: Heeey! Excuse me! Please let me through!
What? Who's that?
You must be Ria Ami, am I right?
Wow... The rumors were true. You're stunning!
The reason I'm here is...
I heard there was a girl of extraordinary@beauty at Mizuna Girls' Academy.
Oh, excuse me! I should give you my card@first!
I'm in the business, you see.
Do you know Vanity Fine? The fashion @magazine?
I'm the chief editor there, so if you were@interested...
Whaaat?! The chief editor for Vanity Fine?!
Next month's issue is going to feature the@trendiest girls with the rawest potential.
You'd be perfect for it.
Please let me know if you're interested!@We'd love to have you!

group_1.textLeft: (Finally, my big break! A huge nationwide@debut!)
Well, I'm sorry to say this, but I have@several other job offers.
I couldn't possibly agree to take this job@right here and now.

group_1.textRight: Oh no, of course!
I wouldn't expect to be the first to approach@a girl of your talent!

group_1.textLeft: I have to go to school now, so...
Could I perhaps contact you later when@I have more time?

group_1.textRight: Oh! Yes, yes! Of course!
Late at night, early morning... Whenever!@I'd be happy to take your call!

group_1.textLeft: *Giggle* Thank you so much. Next time,@then.

group_1.textRight: You got it! I'll be waiting!
O-M-G! Miss Ami's gonna be in Vanity Fine!

group_1.textCenter: (I'm Ria Ami, the image of perfection from@the day I was born.)
(And beauty like mine can't be confined to@mere school pageants!)

group_1.narration: The rumors of Ria Ami's beauty showed no@signs of slowing, and now she'd been invited@to be featured in a national magazine.
With this first connection, her dreams of@being a magazine model were in reach.

group_1.textCenter: That just proves how powerful the beauty@of Ria Ami really is.
